title: Ghost in the Shell: Arise Alternative Architecture
resume: The story follows Motoko Kusanagi, a highly skilled member of the  military, whom upon meeting Daisuke Aramaki, a current chief of the  Public Security Section 9, in less than desirable conditions struggles  to clear her name whilst forming her own independent team with the  highest priority under the sponsorship and guidance of the chief Aramaki  himself.  Ghost in the Shell: Arise is a re-imagining of Masamune Shirow's Ghost in the Shell.
